description: Financial parameters for ZeroSite Phase 2.5 Enhanced Metrics

public.rationale: Government projects use lower discount rates reflecting social benefits and lower risk tolerance

private.rationale: Commercial projects use higher rates reflecting opportunity cost of capital and market risk

notes: Public discount rate: 2% (LH standard for public housing projects)
Private discount rate: 5.5% (Market average for real estate development)
These rates are configurable and should be adjusted based on market conditions
Public rate reflects social welfare considerations
